artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Trifold sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,389); at the left are three elaborate women's hats; in the center is a woman sitting on a blue chair in a white gown with an orange overgown and a green and white ribbon around her waist, a green hat with pink ribbon, black plumes, and three white plumes with pink and green detailing; on the right a woman in a white, green, and orange gown with a simple white head scarf
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Fashion plate from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Treizième Cahier, 1 Avril 1789
